00025 #ifndef _BASE_STDFILESYSTEM_
00026 #define _BASE_STDFILESYSTEM_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/VFileSystem>
00030 #include <base/Directory>
00031 
00032 namespace base {
00033 
00034 
00035 class StdFileSystem : public VFileSystem
00036 {
00037 public:
00038   StdFileSystem();
00039   virtual ~StdFileSystem();
00040 
00041   virtual String className() const { return String("StdFileSystem"); }
00042   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) StdFileSystem(*this); }
00043 
00044   virtual ref<VDirectory> root(); ///< get the root directory of this VFileSystem (e.g. "/")
00045   virtual ref<VDirectory> temp(); ///< get directory in which temporary files can be stored
00046   virtual ref<VDirectory> current(); ///< get the current working directory
00047   virtual void setCurrent(const PathName& path) throw (path_not_found, io_error, std::invalid_argument); ///< set the current directory (defaults to root)
00048 
00049   virtual ref<VDirectory> getDirectory(const PathName& path)   throw (path_not_found, io_error, std::invalid_argument);
00050   virtual ref<VFile>      getFile(const PathName& path)        throw (path_not_found, io_error, std::invalid_argument);
00051   virtual bool            exists(const PathName& path)         throw (io_error);
00052 
00053 protected:  
00054   StdFileSystem(const StdFileSystem& fs) {}
00055 
00056   ref<Directory> currentDir;
00057 };
00058 
00059 } // base
00060 
00061 #endif
